messages.subject: Hawaii Folks?
messages.msgSnippet: I m speaking in Hawaii (Oahu) on Friday and Saturday next week (once for the Hawaii Home Ed. Association http://www.hawaiihomeschoolassociation.org and once at
messages.messageBody:
I'm speaking in Hawaii (Oahu) on Friday and Saturday next week (once
for the Hawaii Home Ed. Association
http://www.hawaiihomeschoolassociation.org

and once at the Honolulu Friends Meeting), and was wondering if there
are any folks from Oahu on this list -- I always look forward to
putting faces with names, but I don't recognize any of you as being
from there (wish we had a map for everyone!) (you can e-mail me
privately if you like.)

david
www.skylarksings.com
